titleStmt.title: Good news for England: or a speedy, safe, and easy vvay how Ireland may be reduced to the obedience of the Crown of England, in six moneths time Humbled [sic] offered to the serious consideration of the King and Queen's most Excellent Majesty, and to the Right Honourable the Lords Spiritual and Temporal, and Commons of England in Parliament assembled. With allowance.

publicationStmt.publisher: and sold at the Three Keys in Nags-Head-Court in Grace-Church-Street,

place.placeName: the Three Keys in Nags-Head-Court in Grace-Church-Street
